original_text: This day the Lord thy God hath commanded thee to do these statutes and judgments: thou shalt therefore keep and do them with all thine heart, and with all thy soul.
korean_text: 오늘 네 하나님 여호와께서 이 규례와 법도를 행하라고 네게 명령하시나니 그런즉 너는 마음을 다하고 뜻을 다하여 지켜 행하라

sentences.original_text: This day the Lord thy God hath commanded thee
sentences.korean_translation: 오늘 너의 하나님 여호와께서 너에게 명령하셨으니

sentences.original_text: to do these statutes and judgments:
thou shalt therefore keep and do them
with all thine heart, and with all thy soul.
